## Practice R Markdown 

```{r}
a <- 4 #both R code and outputs displayed
a + 3
```


```{r, include=FALSE}
b <- 4 #not displayed
b + 3
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
d <- 4 #only the output displayed
dd <- d * 0.222
dd
```

If we want to insert **R** values in your comments, we can use *dd* is equal to `r round(dd, 2)`.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
f <- 4 #only R code shown; outputs not displayed
f + 3
```
